content: little cow is the 3rd pattern in the spring mini amigurumi crochet along the crochet along includes 12 farm animals each one sitting about 3 tall the free pattern is available on 5littlemonsters com or it is available for purchase in ebook form with all 12 patterns included the cow uses the following supplies -medium weight yarn -g crochet hook -6 mm safety eyes -fiberfill -yarn needle -stitch markers -embroidery floss -embroidery needle
